value: — the gateway to Issyk Kul, Balykchy is a former fishing town with a train service from Bishkek through a beautiful pass
— an upscale summer resort surrounded by mountains
— a small lakeside picturesque town where you can have a radioactive bath (literally!)
— one of the gems of Issyk Kul, this was originally a Slavic settlement with a wealth of outdoor sports available

— city bisected by Narin River, flowing through a beautiful gorge
— mainly a beach resort, overnight yurt stays and horseback riding trips can be arranged here, too

— surrounded by the massive snowcapped Tian Shan, this is the main attraction of the region (and the country, for that matter) with a touristy north shore and a rugged south shore
